ResourceWithEtag.description: An azure resource object with an Etag property

ClientInfo.description: Information on the client (user or application) that made some action

objectId.description: The object id of the client.

userPrincipalName.description: The user principal name of the client.

UserInfo.description: User information that made some action

objectId.description: The object id of the user.

Label.description: Label that will be used to tag and filter on.

code.description: An identifier for the error. Codes are invariant and are intended to be consumed programmatically.

message.description: A message describing the error, intended to be suitable for display in a user interface.

OperationalInsightsResourceProvider.description: The namespace of workspaces resource provider- Microsoft.OperationalInsights.
OperationalInsightsResourceProvider.name: operationalInsightsResourceProvider

ODataFilter.description: Filters the results, based on a Boolean condition. Optional.
ODataFilter.name: $filter

ODataSkipToken.description: Skiptoken is only used if a previous operation returned a partial result. If a previous response contains a nextLink element, the value of the nextLink element will include a skiptoken parameter that specifies a starting point to use for subsequent calls. Optional.
ODataSkipToken.name: $skipToken

ODataTop.description: Returns only the first n results. Optional.
ODataTop.name: $top

ODataSkip.description: Used to skip n elements in the OData query (offset). Returns a nextLink to the next page of results if there are any left.
ODataSkip.name: $skip
